examples.text: The doctor detected a <w>hemic</w> murmur during the routine cardiac examination.
Various <w>hemic</w> disorders can significantly affect the body's ability to transport oxygen.

senses.sense_definition: Relating to heme, the iron-containing component of hemoglobin.

examples.text: The researcher studied the <w>hemic</w> structure to better understand iron binding mechanisms.
This specific chemical reaction affects the <w>hemic</w> portion of the molecule.

senses.sense_definition: Somewhat decomposed; used to describe organic soil material that is at an intermediate stage of decomposition.

examples.text: The soil analysis revealed a thick layer of <w>hemic</w> material beneath the surface.
Peat is often classified as fibric, <w>hemic</w>, or sapric depending on how much it has decomposed.
